item.title: Hello World!
item.description:
After a grand total of years of formal education, working at various companies, and travelling around parts of the world I decided it was about damn time to document some of my thoughts, findings, and memorable moments.

This blog will be used to:

  • demonstrate cool software projects I build,
  • showcase and host photos,
  • describe my experiences going through life, work, and stuff,
  • â€¦ and more!

Thanks for stopping by, feel free to comment and say hi below, and stay tuned for updates!
